creator: boris@i3.informatik.rwth-aachen.de
text:
I hava a subclass of Category named `Logger'. In my application I use the
following line to create an instance of it:

  private static final Logger = Logger.create("com.foo.Bar")

If I then have something like the following line in my log4j.properties file I
get a class cast exception because the method
Category.getInstance("com.foo.Bar", new LoggerFactory()) returns a Category
instead of a Logger object.

  log4j.category.com.foo.Bar
Please read the log4j trouble shooting guide.
creator: ceki@apache.org
